# Deferred

Promise wrapper that allows to manipulate it more easily by making `resolve` and `reject` accessible outside the usual callback.

```typescript
class Deferred<T>
```

## Properties

| Property | Type                       | Description           |
| -------- | -------------------------- | --------------------- |
| promise  | `Promise<T>`               |                       |
| reject   | `(...args: any[]) => void` | Rejects the promise.  |
| resolve  | `(...args: any[]) => void` | Resolves the promise. |
